summary: A French woman returns to her childhood home in Cameroon - formerly a colonial outpost - where she's flooded by memories, particularly of Protée, her servant.
cast: Isaach De Bankolé|Giulia Boschi|François Cluzet|Jean-Claude Adelin|Laurent Arnal|Jean Bediebe|Jean-Quentin Châtelain|Emmanuelle Chaulet|Kenneth Cranham|Jacques Denis|Cécile Ducasse|Clementine Essono|Didier Flamand|Essindi Mindja|Donatus Ngala|Edwige Nto Ngon a Zock|Philemon Blake Ondoua|Mireille Perrier|Emmet Judson Williamson|Hervé Abah|Saïdou Abatcha|Alain Artur|Jean-Marc Bamdiran|Tadfor Kamajou|Saidou Karim|Agnes Ndoumbe|Ian Stapel|Hélène Vauquois
title: Chocolat
